summary: Completed comprehensive testing of payroll management system MVP. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% test success rate. Frontend UI components, navigation, and integration are working correctly. Dashboard displays real employee data, employee list shows existing records, and add employee form is functional with proper validation.

design_issues.issue: Direct URL navigation to /employees/new redirects to dashboard
design_issues.description: Users cannot bookmark or directly access the add employee form URL

passed_tests: Dashboard stats API with correct data structure
Employee CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
API error handling for non-existent resources
Dashboard page loads with real employee statistics (2 employees)
Employee list page displays existing employee records
Add Employee button navigation and form loading
Form field input functionality (name, email, phone)
Form validation with error messages (7 validation errors detected)
Back navigation from add employee form to employee list
Responsive design testing (mobile and desktop viewports)
